revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RN2100 Main.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 1U 4-Bay ReadyNAS Rackmount Storage |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/RN21241E.aspx |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Netgear_ReadyNAS_2120_v2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = ReadyNAS |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 2120 |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RN2120 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;MV78230;ARMADA XP, PJ4 Core; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.0 / 1.2 / 1.33 / 1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U1G8F2BTR-BC; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = 2 |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L2006EM1I-12G; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83GFR-RDC; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E8:FC:AF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.4.218.armada.1;ReadyNASOS 6.10.5;
|exp_if_types = eSATA 2.0, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = 2 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 3 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J6 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, eSATA, Link Aggregation, SNMP, fan, heatsink, metal case |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12057;;1;,,, USB 3.0 / xHCI Host Controller;Fresco Logic;FL1009;;1;,,, SATA 6Gb/s Host Controller;Marvell;88SE9170;;2;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G751-2f;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;3;,,, 4x Linear 12V Fan Driver;GMT;G9941;;3;,,, Single Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51218;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, Synchronous Switching Regulator Controller;Marvell;88PH8101;;1;,,, 18V 8A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-8;;1;,,, 16V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1493;;1;,,, 30V 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;1;,,, 30V 21A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS8888;;1;,,, 30V 42A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS0312S;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7692;;2;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449103151 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00MQK1Y7K |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RN2120 MB V3.0" is silkscreened on the main board "RN2120 Front Board V2.0 E2" is silkscreened on the front board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' MV78230 @1.6GHz Dual Core (ARM v7) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash, 4x SATA, 2x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 *Power: 120-240V via C13
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ReadyNASOS_WW_src_V6.10.5.zip Latest GPL Source]
